scopes.organization:view: Allow members to view the organization
scopes.organization:manage: Allow members to manage the organization
scopes.organization:delete: Allow members to delete the organization
scopes.server:transfer: Allow members to transfer servers to another Forge account
scopes.server:manage-meta: Allow members to change server settings such as name and IP address
scopes.server:manage-packages: Allow members to configure and remove server and site package authentication
scopes.server:manage-php: Allow members to install and change PHP installations
scopes.server:manage-logs: Allow members to clear server and site logs
scopes.server:manage-network: Allow members to change the server‘s firewall
scopes.server:manage-nginx-templates: Allow members to manage Nginx templates
scopes.server:manage-services: Allow members to start, stop and restart services
scopes.server:manage-password: Allow members to reset the sudo password
scopes.server:create-keys: Allow members to add SSH keys to servers
scopes.server:delete-keys: Allow members to remove SSH keys from servers
scopes.server:create-monitors: Allow members to create server monitors
scopes.server:delete-monitors: Allow members to delete server monitors
scopes.server:create-databases: Allow members to create databases and database users
scopes.server:delete-databases: Allow members to delete databases and database users
scopes.server:create-backups: Allow members to create database backup configurations
scopes.server:delete-backups: Allow members to delete database backup configurations
scopes.server:create-schedulers: Allow members to create scheduled jobs
scopes.server:delete-schedulers: Allow members to delete scheduled jobs
scopes.server:web-terminal: Allow members to start web terminal sessions
scopes.site:meta: Allow members to update site meta data such as domain name and aliases
scopes.site:manage-commands: Allow members to run arbitrary commands from the site‘s root directory
scopes.site:manage-deploys: Allow members to deploy the site and update the deployment script
scopes.site:manage-nginx: Allow members to manage the site‘s Nginx configuration file
scopes.site:manage-project: Allow members to install Git repositories, phpMyAdmin and WordPress applications
scopes.site:manage-environment: Allow members to update the site‘s environment file
scopes.site:manage-notifications: Allow members to configure deployment notifications
scopes.site:manage-queues: Allow members to configure queue workers
scopes.site:manage-redirects: Allow members to configure URL redirects
scopes.site:manage-security: Allow members to configure HTTP Basic Authentication
scopes.site:manage-ssl: Allow members to configure SSL and Let‘s Encrypt certificates
scopes.site:manage-integrations: Allow members to manage site integrations
scopes.team:delete: Allow members to delete teams and team members
scopes.billing:manage: Allow members to manage the organization's subscription
scopes.storage:manage: Allow members to manage the organization's storage providers.
scopes.integrations:manage: Allow members to manage the organization's integrations
scopes.user:view: Allow members to view user details

healthcheck_endpoint.description: The endpoint / URL that should be used to perform healthchecks.

name.description: The name of the heartbeat.

grace_period.description: The duration (in minutes) after which a heartbeat is considered missing.

frequency.description: The interval (in minutes) at which the client is expected to send a ping.

custom_frequency.description: A cron expression representing the custom frequency at which the client is expected to send a ping, if the frequency is set to -1.

name.description: The name of the nginx template.

content.description: The content of the nginx template.

php_version.description: The PHP version to update the CLI to.

name.description: The name of the security rule.

path.description: The path for the security rule.

credentials.description: The credentials for the security rule.

push_to_deploy.description: Automatically trigger a new deployment when changes are pushed to the environment's Git branch.

role_id.description: The ID of the role to assign to the team member.

name.description: The name of the vpc

self.description: A link to the resource itself

errors.description: A detailed description of each field that failed validation.
